Articles.Content:
Hello, my name's Silentzo (If you haven't read it already) and I've recently (A couple of minutes ago) purchased KSP.

I've already played it at a friend's house a version or 2 ago and now that it's gone on Steam, and the fact that this is the last month that I can purchase this without having to pay for the expansion packs, I've got it too.

I hope to have fun in here, and make worthy spacecrafts that shall conquer the universe!
